001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.service;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.client.DbClient;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.client.DbClientManager;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config.DatabaseConfiguration;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.json.JsonPathExtractor;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.log.LogDb;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.query.DbQuery;
009import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.query.QueryResponse;
010import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.validator.QueryResponseValidator;
011import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.Assertion;
012import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.AssertionResult;
013import java.util.List;
014import lombok.Getter;
015import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
016import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
017
018/**
019 * Provides services for executing and validating database queries.
020 *
021 * <p>This class facilitates database interactions by executing queries,
022 * extracting specific data from query responses, and validating results
023 * using predefined assertions.
024 *
025 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
026 */
027@Service
028public class DatabaseService {
029
030   private final JsonPathExtractor jsonPathExtractor;
031   @Getter
032   private final DbClientManager dbClientManager;
033   private final QueryResponseValidator queryResponseValidator;
034
035   /**
036    * Constructs a {@code DatabaseService} with the required dependencies.
037    *
038    * @param jsonPathExtractor      Utility for extracting specific values from query results using JSONPath.
039    * @param dbClientManager        Manages database client connections.
040    * @param queryResponseValidator Validates query responses against assertions.
041    */
042   @Autowired
043   public DatabaseService(JsonPathExtractor jsonPathExtractor,
044                          DbClientManager dbClientManager,
045                          QueryResponseValidator queryResponseValidator) {
046      this.jsonPathExtractor = jsonPathExtractor;
047      this.dbClientManager = dbClientManager;
048      this.queryResponseValidator = queryResponseValidator;
049   }
050
051   /**
052    * Executes a database query and retrieves the result.
053    *
054    * @param query The query to execute.
055    * @return The query response containing the result set.
056    */
057   public QueryResponse query(DbQuery<?> query) {
058      DatabaseConfiguration dbConfig = query.config();
059      DbClient client = dbClientManager.getClient(dbConfig);
060      return client.executeQuery(query.query());
061   }
062
063   /**
064    * Executes a query and extracts a specific value using JSONPath.
065    *
066    * @param query      The query to execute.
067    * @param jsonPath   The JSONPath expression to extract a value.
068    * @param resultType The expected type of the extracted value.
069    * @param <T>        The type parameter for the extracted value.
070    * @return The extracted value.
071    */
072   public <T> T query(DbQuery<?> query, String jsonPath, Class<T> resultType) {
073      DatabaseConfiguration dbConfig = query.config();
074      DbClient client = dbClientManager.getClient(dbConfig);
075
076      String sql = query.query();
077      QueryResponse queryResponse = client.executeQuery(sql);
078      LogDb.step(
079            "Extracting value from query result: '{}' using JSONPath expression: '{}' and casting to '{}'.",
080            sql, jsonPath, resultType.getSimpleName());
081
082      return jsonPathExtractor.extract(queryResponse.getRows(), jsonPath, resultType);
083   }
084
085   /**
086    * Validates a query response against a set of assertions.
087    *
088    * @param queryResponse The query response to validate.
089    * @param assertions    The assertions to apply.
090    * @param <T>           The expected result type.
091    * @return A list of assertion results indicating pass or failure.
092    */
093   public <T> List<AssertionResult<T>> validate(QueryResponse queryResponse, Assertion... assertions) {
094      return queryResponseValidator.validateQueryResponse(queryResponse, assertions);
095   }
096
097   /**
098    * Executes a query and validates its response against assertions.
099    *
100    * @param query      The query to execute.
101    * @param assertions The assertions to validate against.
102    * @param <T>        The expected result type.
103    * @return A list of assertion results indicating pass or failure.
104    */
105   public <T> List<AssertionResult<T>> queryAndValidate(DbQuery<?> query, Assertion... assertions) {
106      DatabaseConfiguration dbConfig = query.config();
107      DbClient client = dbClientManager.getClient(dbConfig);
108
109      QueryResponse queryResponse = client.executeQuery(query.query());
110      return queryResponseValidator.validateQueryResponse(queryResponse, assertions);
111   }
112
113}
